page.title: 03Dayly routine of a secretary
page.content: Here is an account of an average day in the life of a secretary who lives in Lower Kingswood, she is a widow and works at a boarding school in Gatton. After getting up, I prepare breakfast for my daughters and feed the dogs and the cat. My older daughter takes my other daughter to school (they catch the train to Croydon). I then go down to see to the horses. I come back, get myself ready and go to work. In the evening I return home and usually have a short break. I probably walk the dogs, I might play tennis in the summer, I may go riding if I can. Later I do the jobs around the house. I have an evening meal. After this I often listen to some music or do some gardening, hopefully have a read and go to bed.
